metadata.title: Patchouli Oil Essential Trading Post Oils 1 fl. oz (30 ML)
features: Patchouli Oil (POGOSTEMON CABLIN) / Ingredient Origin – INDONESIA / Ingredient Type - ESSENTIAL OIL / Extraction Method - STEAM DISTILLED

Description: Patchouli is a very fragrant herb with soft oval leaves and square stems. It grows from 2 to 3 feet in height and provides an unusual odor that is nonetheless characteristic of patchouli when the leaves are rubbed.

Common Uses: The uses for essential oils both for health and emotions are vast and diverse. Essential oils have many therapeutic uses in Aromatherapy. Some products that you can make with essential oils are – natural cleaners, candles, laundry and body soap, air fresheners, massage, bath products, health and beauty, muscle rubs, energy boosters, breath fresheners, mental clarity and headache reliving products

Essential Trading Post is guided today by its original value to commitment of product quality, customer service and business integrity at an affordable price. Our collection includes some of the following oils Allspice Angelica Root Anise Star Basil Bay Bergamot Birch Black Pepper Orange Cajeput Clementine Clove Cumin Cypress Dill Eucalyptus Fennel Fir Needle Thieves Frankincense Lavender Geranium Ginger Grapefruit Helichrysum Ho Wood Hyssop Jasmine

Thieves Frankincense Lavender Geranium Ginger Grapefruit Helichrysum Ho Wood Hyssop Jasmine Juniper Berry Lime Lavender Lemon Lemongrass Litsea Mandarin Melissa Myrrh Myrtle Neroli Niaouli Nutmeg Oregano Palmarosa Parsley Patchouli Peppermint Spearmint Penny Royal Peppermint Petitgrain Pine Ravensara Rose Rosemary Rosewood Sage Sandalwood Spearmint Spruce Marjoram Tangerine Tea Tree Thyme Turmeric Valerian Vanilla Vetiver Wintergreen Yarrow Ylang Ylang Almond Amber Balsam
description: Patchouli is a very fragrant herb with soft oval leaves and square stems. It grows from 2 to 3 feet in height and provides an unusual odor that is nonetheless characteristic of patchouli when the leaves are rubbed. The color of the patchouli oil is affected by the distillation machine. If distillation is done in stainless steel then the color will be light, hence if done in iron then the color will be darker.
Patchouli has a warm, earthy aroma with fresh fruit - like tones.

All of our oils are labeled (NOT FOR INTERNAL USE). Our oil line has multi-uses from simply scenting your home to making a vast line of products. Very little of our oil is needed to create a long and lasting essence.
Dilute before use; for external use only. May cause skin irritation in some individuals; a skin test is recommended prior to use. Contact with eyes should be avoided.

All Essential Trading Post products are for external use only unless otherwise indicated. This information is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, and it should not be used by anyone who is pregnant or under the care of a medical practitioner.
